main.name: Michael Jin
main.description: Seeing how my work can bring so much value to my clients is what drives my work ethic. I always love helping people create a digital space that provides value.
main.bio: Creative full-stack developer with 10+ years of experience building modern, scalable web applications. Specializing in integrating AI from conversational agents to recommendation systems and predictive models to enhance user experience and automate complex workflows. Skilled across front-end, back-end, and cloud architectures, with a focus on delivering practical, high-impact solutions.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me in any case and if I will be able, I will be happy to help you ðŸ™‚

testimonials.text: Michael and the team of developers working on my project were AMAZING. Communication was always immediate and they understood the tasks. The development they did (Creating a custom website platform: front and back end) was excellent. They also created a Smart Contract and synced the Blockchain with my website to integrate transactions. They are very patient and attended to my requests immediately. This team is definitely a great one. After working with them for months, I highly recommend them.

He is probably the best web developer. His reviews speak for themselves, and I'm here to just add another one. He is experienced, takes a holistic approach, and is an invaluable asset to me and many others who have brought him on as a developer for their projects. If you need a developer for your web project, look no further.
Amazing work, we will continue working together and definitely recommended for everything blockchain and smart contract related!

Michael went way beyond what i expected of him,came up with a novel approach that i never consider.he's hard working and delivered a complicated project way faster than I thought he would.i will definitely work with him again in the future as programmer with his work ethic and talent are extremely rare.
